stitch below it to maintain pattern and in each fpdc and bpdc across to opposite side of heel continue in alternating fpdc and bpdc pattern in single_crochet stitches of heel to end of round keep an eye on your stitch count as it tends to inadvertently increase during this round if necessary do a pd2tog to maintain the same stitch count that you had before the heel slip_stitch in first bpdc ch2
